page.description: Properties and methods in the Element Class.

property.name: stack
property.description:
Type: "Stack",
Stylesheet stack (for resolving name in context).

methodref.name: CreatePositionalStyle
methodref.description: Creates the flattened style element for a positional style for n of count elements.

methodref.name: CreateStyle
methodref.description: Creates the style for a positional element.

methodref.name: NewInstance
methodref.description: Create a new object instance of the same type.
